channel.title: Claire Denis on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Claire Denis on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Awakening’: With Timely Viennale Trailer, Joanna Hogg Follows in the Footsteps of David Lynch, Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: Check out the Vienna Film Festival’s 2025 teaser and past trailers from such legendary directors as Radu Jude, Leos Carax, Abel Ferrara, and Claire Denis, and one starring Natalie Portman.

item.title: ‘Awakening’: With Timely Viennale Trailer, Joanna Hogg Follows in the Footsteps of David Lynch, Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: Check out the Vienna Film Festival’s 2025 teaser and past trailers from such legendary directors as Radu Jude, Leos Carax, Abel Ferrara, and Claire Denis, and one starring Natalie Portman.

item.title: ‘The Fence’ Review: Matt Dillon Stars in Claire Denis’ Vividly Atmospheric but Jarringly Stagy Africa-Set Drama
item.description: The French auteur’s latest, premiering at TIFF, takes place during one long night on a construction site marked by murder and sexual tension.

item.title: ‘The Fence’ Review: Matt Dillon Stars in Claire Denis’ Vividly Atmospheric but Jarringly Stagy Africa-Set Drama
item.description: The French auteur’s latest, premiering at TIFF, takes place during one long night on a construction site marked by murder and sexual tension.

item.title: Paolo Sorrentino, Claire Denis, Samuel Abrahams, Gastón Solnicki Films Added to BFI London Film Festival
item.description: The 69th BFI London Film Festival has added four additional titles to its program, including U.K. premieres of Paolo Sorrentino’s “La Grazia,” Claire Denis’ “The Fence&#8
